hint.text: Important notice: We work on the 15th of May City region and the Helwan region and their environs.

phase_2.title: oil shouldn't be reused for cooking!

phase_4.title: replace your oil with a product

steps.card_1: fill out the form and get a free product or get paid
steps.card_2: collect at least 3 liters of used cooking oil in a bottle
steps.card_3: contact with us via Facebook, WhatsApp or phone call
steps.card_4: we will get to you in 48 hours since filling out the form

form_1.term: i agree to collect oil every month

googleForm.title: In case you have issues in the current form, please sign up through this one.

about.mainText: a company consisted of a group of aspiring youth to provide a community service that benefits every Egyptian house and provide environmental solutions in reducing pollution rates resulting from throwing consumed oil in water by collecting and directing it in the path of alternative energy production
about.subText: and offering community solutions by providing high-quality and safe  products for free, relying on teamwork and efficiency in activity management and seeking to understand client needs from other products and providing these products in return of  the minimal effort of the client.

vision.text: collecting  consumed food oil from houses and replacing them with high-quality products for free and delivering them to customers using the best methods at all to communicate with clients in a professional manner and providing the best safe products which make the quality of our services and customers satisfaction one of the most important items in our marketing plan.

aim.text: creating new needs of customers by replacing a consumed product with a high-quality product for free and providing environmental and community solutions.

card_1.q: do you reuse consumed oil in food again?
card_1.a: that is very dangerous on health, so we don't reuse it in food.

card_2.q: can I really get my favorable product for free?
card_2.a: of course you can get any product you want from our products, one product = 3 liters of consumed food oil.

card_3.q: where is the company head office and does it have branches?
card_3.a: the head office at 15th of May city - branches extend to Helwan and Atlas.

card_4.q: what alternative energy do you produce?
